Articles.Content:
After installing K2D2, all my stages auto seperated - i loved that as I got to sit back and watch the launch like it was a live TV broadcast.  However I had to wipe and re-install KSP2 and all mods, and I can't figure out how to re-enable auto state seperation with K2D2.

Does anyone know how to re-enable auto stage sep during launch, is there a different mod that I can use?
On the right-hand side of K2-D2 title bar, there's a push button labeled "S". Push it and it will enable automatic staging.
